sent.orig: He has just come back.; He came back just now.
You came just at the right moment. I was just going to look for you.
sent.trans: 你来得正巧，我正想去找你。

sent.orig: "But you're just as guilty!"Jane came back.
"I've just arrived by train,"she said."I'm coming to see you."
sent.trans: “我刚刚乘火车到达这里，”她说道。“我来看你。”

sent.orig: "Just look at me", she said smugly.
